mapper.select:
select distinct(PRODUCT_NAME,FACTORY) from t_base_ne where 1=1 and BASE_EMS_CONNECTION_ID in
${emsId}

SELECT conver.CONVERGE_ID,conver.RULE_NAME,conver.STATUS,conver.DESCRIPTION, conver.MODIFIER,CAST(conver.UPDATE_TIME AS CHAR) AS UPDATE_TIME, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(ALARM_NAME) FROM t_alarm_converge_condition cond WHERE cond.`CONVERGE_ID`=conver.`CONVERGE_ID`) AS mainAlarmName, CONCAT("网管：",(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(ems.DISPLAY_NAME) FROM t_alarm_converge_scope scope LEFT JOIN t_base_ems_connection ems ON scope.`EMS_ID`=ems.`BASE_EMS_CONNECTION_ID` WHERE scope.`CONVERGE_ID`=conver.`CONVERGE_ID`)) AS applyRegion, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT((CASE WHEN map.FACTORY=1 THEN '华为' WHEN map.FACTORY=2 THEN '中兴' WHEN map.FACTORY=3 THEN '朗讯' WHEN map.FACTORY=4 THEN '烽火' WHEN map.FACTORY=9 THEN '富士通' END),equip.`PRODUCT_NAME`)) FROM t_alarm_converge_equipment equip,t_base_product_mapping map WHERE equip.`CONVERGE_ID`=conver.`CONVERGE_ID` AND equip.PRODUCT_NAME=map.PRODUCT_NAME)AS applyEquip FROM t_alarm_converge conver
limit #{start},#{limit}
select PARAM_VALUE from t_sys_param where PARAM_KEY = #{paramKey}
mapper.delete: delete from t_alarm_converge where CONVERGE_ID in ${"("+convergeIds+")"}
mapper.select: SELECT (CASE WHEN map.FACTORY=1 THEN '华为' WHEN map.FACTORY=2 THEN '中兴' WHEN map.FACTORY=3 THEN '朗讯' WHEN map.FACTORY=4 THEN '烽火' WHEN map.FACTORY=9 THEN '富士通' END) as factoryStr, map.FACTORY,equip.`PRODUCT_NAME` FROM t_alarm_converge_equipment equip left join t_base_product_mapping map on equip.PRODUCT_NAME=map.PRODUCT_NAME WHERE equip.`CONVERGE_ID`=#{convergeId}

SELECT ems.BASE_EMS_CONNECTION_ID as nodeId, gro.GROUP_NAME as GROUP_NAME,ems.DISPLAY_NAME as EMS_NAME FROM t_alarm_converge_scope scope LEFT JOIN t_base_ems_connection ems ON scope.`EMS_ID`=ems.`BASE_EMS_CONNECTION_ID` LEFT JOIN t_base_ems_group gro ON gro.`BASE_EMS_GROUP_ID`=ems.`BASE_EMS_GROUP_ID` WHERE scope.`CONVERGE_ID`=#{convergeId}
